Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Since chemotherapeutic agent toxicity generally correlates with dose per body surface area , we retrospectively calculated the dose of CYA in patients transplanted at our institution to determine whether the incidence of CYA cardiotoxicity correlated with the dose per body surface area .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CYA cardiotoxicity |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions a "CYA cardiotoxicity" which refers to a disease-related condition caused by the toxicity of a chemotherapeutic agent called CYA. Therefore, "CYA cardiotoxicity" is the disease entity in this paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CYA cardiotoxicity |

Explanation:

The only disease entity in this paragraph is "CYA cardiotoxicity" which is a disease-related condition caused by the toxicity of a chemotherapeutic agent called CYA. The other term "chemotherapeutic agent toxicity" is a general term that refers to the adverse effects of chemotherapy drugs, rather than a specific disease. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
